nodes.text: The royal fleet of the Inner Rim planet Pijal was a fleet comprising of several ships, headed by the Heavenly Sphere. During the Republic Era, the fleet served the Pijali monarchy. Around 40 BBY, the Pijali Princess Fanry took control of the fleet after her coronation and attempted to use it to attack the Leverage, a Czerka Corporation cruiser.
The royal fleet appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
